description: NOTIFICATION OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT \\n The Department of National Defence wants to purchase the following items: \\n Item 1: Elbow Hose, Part No.: CMC-4-5801-16-16, 40 pieces to be delivered to CFB Halifax, NS\\n Item 2: Elbow Hose, Part No.: CMC-4-5801-16-16, 60 pieces to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, BC\\n Submission of prices in Canadian dollars is compulsory\\n
full_summary:
### Solicitation for Purchase for Elbow Hose

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Solicitation Number**: W8482-230975/A
**Publication Date**: 2022-11-07
**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-20T14:00:00

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of elbow hoses. The successful bidder must supply products meeting specific quality and delivery requirements.

**Delivery Locations**:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Required Items**:

* 40 units of elbow hose (NSN 00-504-7509) with part number CMC-4-5801-16-16
* 60 units of elbow hose (NSN 00-504-7509) with part number CMC-4-5801-16-16

**Product Requirements**:

* Equivalent or Substitute Products must be accompanied with the brand name, model, and part number and their corresponding NCAGE.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bids in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Documents**:

* The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents and amendment can be found at: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/07/9e4f6598cf8a2df685e6e1a26138bd74/w8482-230975_-_english_rfp_clauses.pdf>
<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/25/8e0931903001f470954105b09587ff89/w8482-230975_amendment001_en.pdf>
<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/07/c9e7a9c9be6cee530160b1d5913c59d3/w8482-230975_-_french_rfp_clauses.pdf>
<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/25/559b44021218ce276e3ebd2c03e03f95/w8482-218836_amendment001_fr.pdf>

**Contact Information**:

* Sophie Sincennes
* Phone: 819-939-4055
* Email: [sophie.sincennes@forces.gc.ca](mailto:s
